title: Analysis from graph of piecewise derivative part - d

content.description: The graph of the continuous function g, the derivative of the function f, is shown above. The function g is piecewise linear for -5 ≤ x < 3, and g(x) = 2(x - 4)2 for 3 ≤ x ≤ 6.
content.question: Find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of f. Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of f. Give a reason for your answer.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
